Chunk.description: A chunk extracted from a document.

quality_score.description: Optional quality score for the chunk.

verified.description: Whether the chunk has been verified.

chunk_size.description: Target chunk size in tokens or characters.

CocoErrorKind.description:
High-level error categories for CoCo.

Adding new variants is a breaking change for the public API.

model_name.description: Model name used to generate embeddings.

ErrorResponse.description: Serializable error response used by API layers.

config_id.description:
Stable identifier of this indexing strategy.
Note: a config_id must map to a compatible embedding dimension/metric.

PublicFilter.description: Filter constraint accepted by the public server API.

field.description: Field name to filter on (server allows `doc_id` and `chunk_id`).

PublicFilterOp.description: Filter operator documented for the public server API.

PublicSearchIntent.description: Search intent describing how retrieval should run.

hybrid_alpha.description: Hybrid weight for vector vs. keyword scoring.

indexing_config_id.description: Optional indexing configuration selection (defaults to the project's default config).

query_embedding.description: Optional query embedding (required for `vector` and `hybrid` retrieval).

query_text.description: Optional user query text (required for `fts` and `hybrid` retrieval).

rerank_top_n.description: Number of top candidates to rerank.

hybrid_alpha.description: Hybrid weight for vector vs. keyword scoring.

SearchHit.description: A search hit with metadata and chunk payload.

SearchHitMeta.description: Metadata associated with a search hit.

verified.description: Whether the result has been verified.

TextSpan.description: A span inside a document, expressed as byte offsets.

VectorBackendConfig.description: Configuration for selecting a vector backend.
